amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that when a student is unable to secure a bank-based loan or does not attend a direct lending institution, that student has the right to go to a guarantee agency or other credit facilitators named in the bill as a lender of last resort, and that the Secretary of Education will advance funds for such purpose.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 15 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998 to authorize the Secretary of Education to provide advances to a guaranty agency in the event the agency needs to serve as a lender of last resort.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
